history.content:
We are excited to kick off this semester with our Association for Socially Responsible Business Spring 2021 Recruitment.
ASRB is a student organization at UC Berkeley with the goal to reinvent the way business is done. Our mission is to empower our members to leverage the potential of business to further social and environmental impact through professional development, education, advocacy, and consulting. We aim to help each member to explore, define, and progress toward the personal social impact they wish to achieve. Join us to learn more about the triple bottom line in business and explore the intersection of business and social impact.
 Info Session 1/26 @8pm PST on Zoom
 Coffee Chats: 1/22 - 1/28 12-3 PM PST tinyurl.com/ASRBcoffee
 Apply HERE by 1/28 11:59 PST tinyurl.com/ASRBspring2021
 Interested? Join our mailing list: tinyurl.com/ASRBMail
 Visit our website at asrbatberkeley.com
Come learn more about our community through our recruitment events outlined on our website. We can't wait to meet you!
history.subject: The Association for Socially Responsible Business is Recruiting for Spring 2021!
